name: Olisipo Way
description: Olisipo Way is an Early Stage Venture Firm focused on IT investments. Our investments are varied in terms of business areas but we have a natural tendency for B2B projects. We speak the same language as entrepreneurs, the language of business. More than investors, we are also entrepreneurs. Our priority is the choice of the right people and the creation of a community that works as a plus in the lives of our startups.
investmentAreas: Adtech, AI, Food Delivery, Food Tech, Transportation

name: Faber VC
description: We invest in teams transforming the world with technology. Faber is a Lisbon-based venture capital firm investing in outstanding entrepreneurs who innovate at the intersection of science and technology to drive digital transformation and climate action. The firm combines a specialist focus on deep tech early stage startups with dedicated funds, investment teams, and expert advisors to actively help founders build global companies powered by AI/data or climate/ocean technologies. Faber’s unique approach in Southern Europe is led by an entrepreneurial management partnership and backed by notable thesis-driven institutions and private investors. Investing since 2013, the firm has been an early investor in hard tech companies such as Unbabel, SWORD Health, Codacy, iLoF, Smartex or YData.
investmentAreas: AI/Data, Climate/Ocean Tech and Web3

name: COREangels EnterpriseTech
description: First international VC specialized in Total Experience, focused on disruptive solutions for Customer or Talent acquistion, retention and engagement. We invest in Europe & USA
investmentAreas: SaaS B2B Adtech MarTech HRTech

name: 3XP Global
description: 3XP Global is an Asset Management firm that aggregates a unique track record in terms of ESG Integration in the Investment Process and Active Role by supporting founders during the all life of the investments cycle. Sustainability Best Practices for Sustainable Investments are our Ethos! Being the first financial company as a B Corp in Portugal, 3xP Global has the 17 United Nations SDG’s (Sustainable Development Goals) as key core values, sustained by the idea that along with sustainability comes return. We are UN PRI signatories and follow the GRI Standards Reporting. 3XP Global invests in companies whose sustainable trends and practices create real value for investors while contributing to a more Sustainable EARTH. Regulated and supervised by Portuguese Securities Market Commission (CMVM), 3XP Global ensures full Transparency, Integrity and Independence. We are fully committed to lead all investments to increase companies' sustainability levels into business models. Therefore, 3XP Global provides the leading platform Grow Sustainable connecting founders to international markets, from Europe to Asia and America.
investmentAreas: Impact Investments; Health and Life Sciences, ESG

name: Massar International
description: Massar Associates, the predecessor organization of Massar International, was founded by Palestinian businessman Bashar Masri in 1994 as a vehicle to promote sustainable economic development in Palestine. Massar is an Arabic word meaning "path". The name symbolizes the vision of its founder to create a company which would successfully link the very best of local professionalism in Palestine with international best practices and an understanding of Western management perspectives in order to integrate the Palestinian economy fully into the global economy.
investmentAreas: Association, Government, Non Profit, Investment Management, Financial, Real State
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: PROEF
description: Proef develops integrated solutions for the IT, Telecom, Power, Cities and Corporate sectors.Proef is a company that develops integrated solutions in a turnkey model for the Telecom, Power, Cities, and Corporate sectors. They aim to drive and lead change in the industry by working closely with customers, partners, and employees
investmentAreas: Electricity, Telecommunications, IT, Renewable Energy, IoT

name: Bright Pixel
description: Former Sonae IM, Bright Pixel Capital is a venture capital company with a global aim, financially driven and oriented to make businesses prosper. We have the power of transformational change across our DNA sectors: Cybersecurity, Retail Technologies, Digital Infrastructure and Emerging Technologies. Envisioned as the tech investment arm of Sonae Group, a Portuguese multinational with a diversified portfolio of innovative brands, Bright Pixel Capital has invested over 250M€ in the first 5 years in more than 50 direct investments, and will continue this path using our expertise to spot unique opportunities with the potential to change an industry.
investmentAreas: Cloud Infrastructure, Cyber Security, Financial Services, IT Infrastructure, Telecommunications, Venture Capital

name: Startup Braga
description: At Startup Braga we know that success is only possible with work and the right tools, so our mission is to provide entrepreneurs with the support and knowledge they need to achieve their goals. In partnership with Microsoft, Startup Braga is a leading innovation hub, designed to assist the inception and development of high potential entrepreneurial projects for international markets. We provide business pre-acceleration, acceleration, and incubation programs, as well as facilitated access to investment sources, for startups with global ambitions.
investmentAreas: Sustainability, Accelerator, Incubator, Investment Management, Digital

name: Startup Lisboa
description: Startup Lisboa mentorship-driven pre-seed to series A stage incubator for tech startups. Startup Lisboa is an incubation program based in downtown Lisbon with work and residence spaces to welcome startups from all over the world. Founded in 2012 by the Lisbon Municipality, Montepio Bank and IAPMEI, it's a private non-profit association that provides physical and virtual incubation.
investmentAreas: Financing, Incubation, Coaching, Mentoring

name: Startup Lighthouse
description: Startup Lighthouse is committed to developing cross border connections within and beyond Europe. The project lights the way for startups within Europe by organising 8 Deep Dive Weeks in 4 ecosystems, meeting over 1,600 different ecosystem players in specific themes and culminating with a Lighthouse Award each year. Startup Lighthouse is a Startup Europe initiative.
investmentAreas: Technology, Information, Internet services, Blockchain, Healthcare

name: Startup Leiria
description: Startup Leiria is an incubator and accelerator with more than 150 startups in the ecossystem. We are a technological innovation network that offers several services and projects to support all types of innovation. Startup Leiria is an entrepreneurial ecosystem that has transformed the entrepreneurial landscape of Leiria, Portugal.
investmentAreas: Business Development, Management Consulting, IT Services, Professional Services

name: Startup LAB
description: Startup LAB is an acceleration program includes training in legal, intellectual property, branding and marketing. Our program is designed to meet the specific needs of each startup. We provide a structured framework to guide your progress and help you achieve your goals, while our market-oriented and validation-driven approach, combined with our community support, can help startups succeed in today’s rapidly evolving market.
investmentAreas: Entrepreneurs, Financial Services, Finance, Mentoring

name: Poolside Accelerator
description: Poolside Accelerator supports and accelerates the development of decentralized technology ventures. Our mission is to become the leading platform to support innovators and progressive ideas, funded by the community. To create a world where value provided by the many, outweighs the influence of the few.
investmentAreas: Finance, Financial Services, Web3, Blockchain, Gaming

name: SURFnCODE
description: Product Studio. Early stage product strategy & acceleration. SURFnCODE is a builder of products and companies. We partner with hand-picked founders of early-stage companies whose missions we believe in to create new products and scale teams into standalone businesses. We are hands-on co-founders that care about the details.
investmentAreas: Product, Venture, AI, Deep Tech

name: Protechting
description: This intensive program is looking for new solutions worldwide in Healthtech and Insurtech, always guaranteeing that the global innovation process is sustainable and collaborative. Protecting is a dynamic open innovation program jointly led by Fosun, Fidelidade, Hospital da Luz Learning Health, and powered by Fábrica de Startups.
investmentAreas: Insurtech, Heakthtec, Innovation, Mentoring

name: Fabrica de Startups
description: Fabrica de Startups is a business accelerator that aims to create new startups in Portugal. Our mission is to help people to become successful entrepreneurs. Using our methodology we help them identifying business ideas, creating teams, designing their business model, finding customers and in the launching of the company.
investmentAreas: Venture Capital, Private Equity Principals, Financial Services, Lending, Investments

name: Venture Catalysts
description: Venture Catalysts is a company focused on commercialization of technologies through entrepreneurship. By supporting visionary researchers and entrepreneurs releasing the full potential of their technologies, the company acts as a catalyst on the development of new technology–based ventures

name: EDP Energy Starter
description: Energy Starter is an open innovation program created by EDP to accelerate the energy transition worldwide by co-innovating impactful solutions with startups and scaleups. Structured into three parallel tracks, the program deep-dives into key areas of the energy sector: Future Grids, Renewable Energy & Green Hydrogen, and Client Solutions.
investmentAreas: Future Grids, Renewable Energy & Green Hydrogen, and Client Solutions

name: Discoveries
description: An intensive four-week acceleration program in Lisbon that will turn fresh ideas into successful businesses crafted to empower high-potential Startups while promoting innovative tourism ventures on a global scale. Through bootcamps, workshops and mentorship we drive market integration and investment attraction. Empower small businesses with Digital Solutions for SMEs.
investmentAreas: Venture Capital, Private Equity, Principals, Entrepreneurs

name: KickUP Sports Innovation
description: Sports innovation platform to support the next generation of sports entrepreneurs and enthusiasts. We are the sports innovation tifosi! More than flags, banners and drums, we support you with passion and hands-on experience. KICKUP Sports Innovation wants to capitalize on the rapidly shifting sports landscape while tapping on opportunities to accelerate technological innovations, ideas and products. We want to bring the sports industry to another level and contribute to improve athletes performance, fan engagement and sports clubs efficiency and operations.
investmentAreas: Innovation, Spectator Sports, Sports Entrepreneurs, Enthusiasts

name: From Start-to-Table
description: The foodtech ecosystem isn't just about food. From Start-to-Table is an acceleration program for innovative startups focused on tech solutions for the F&B and restaurant sectors, sustainable F&B products and future food concepts. Bringing innovation to the restaurant ecosystem.
investmentAreas: Innovation, Startups, Tecnology, F&B, Restaurant Ecosystem

name: Venture Catalysts
description: Venture Catalysts is a company focused on commercialization of technologies through entrepreneurship. By supporting visionary researchers and entrepreneurs releasing the full potential of their technologies, the company acts as a catalyst on the development of new technology–based ventures
investmentAreas: Advanced Materials, Biotechnology, Genetics, Hardware, Nanotechnology

name: Gotbit
description: Gotbit provides a platform-based solution, bringing back control of the markets to the founders of the project. Gotbit was founded in 2017, when BTC was just a $1000. We lived through the ICO boom, blockchain regulation and Binance launch. In the time since we went from two traders to a big company, spanning multiple branches of the crypto market.
investmentAreas: Trading, Software Development, Cryptocurrency, Blockchain, AI

name: Grow
description: Grow by Jose de Mello - The perfect ecosystem to develop your startup. Grow connects startups with our companies in win-win partnerships. Through access to our infrastructure and people, startups have the opportunity to test their solutions in the real market and accelerate their businesses. At the same time, José de Mello gets first-hand access to new ideas and challenges to its business models.
investmentAreas: Health, Mobility, Industry, Senior Homecare, Wine

name: Build Up Labs
description: A Startup Studio and Incubator helping startups launch and grow in a more efficient way. Build Up Labs is a startup studio that ideates, builds, and grows several startups in parallel, based on a lean process. By creating new ventures, from ideation to business models, from UX to development, from growth hacking to social media management, we generate and validate digital product ideas.
investmentAreas: Software Development, Venture Builder, Innovation, Mobile Apps, Social Apps

name: Building Global Innovators
description: Building Global Innovators is a tech-based accelerator for ventures with a deep technological component (Health Tech, Enterprise IT, etc). BGI is a startup accelerator, born in 2010 from a partnership between MIT Portugal (MIT Portugal Entrepreneurship and Innovation Initiative) and ISCTE. Over the past decade, our flagship accelerator program, BGI Accelerator, has helped over 160 startups from 76 countries raise over €300 million.
investmentAreas: Business Consulting, Business Service, Financial service, FinTech

name: Amorim Cork Ventures
description: Amorim Cork Ventures has been established with the purpose of supporting entrepreneurs launch their projects. Amorim Cork Ventures has been established in 2014 with the purpose of supporting entrepreneurs and startups launch their projects and businesses while exploring innovative products and applications for cork. This Corticeira Amorim company's main purpose is to promote the development and expansion of new cork products and cork-related businesses, mainly targeted to foreign markets.
investmentAreas: Entrepreneurs, Investment, Innovation, Innovative Products

name: ASTROPRENEURS Space Startup Accelerator
description: ASTROPRENEURS Space Startup Accelerator turns space-related ideas into viable businesses, promoting opportunities for entrepreneurs. Astropreneurs Accelerator is a three-month acceleration program that includes business and technical mentorship, support to fund your business idea and access to our “SPACE Economy “Astropreneurs” network”. Space Startup Accelerator.
investmentAreas: Space, Accelerator, Aerospace, Research, Entrepreneurship

name: Beta-Start
description: The Beta-start is an acceleration program for entrepreneurs that want to create and develop their startups. We are a collaborative innovation consultancy with a global reach. For more than 12 years we have been the partner of choice for world-class companies to accelerate their innovation journey. We’re experts on managing corporate and open innovation, and on designing impactful strategies, products and services alongside in-company teams.
investmentAreas: Innovation, Entrepreneurship, Consulting, Acceleration

name: Blue Bio Value
description: Blue Bio Value is an accelerator that scales up marine biobased solutions to global market applications in different industries. Ideas as powerful as the ocean - The world needs your sustainable solutions, now more than ever. Blue Bio Value is an international business acceleration and ideation programme based in Portugal dedicated to the blue bioeconomy, and we want you to be a part of it.
investmentAreas: Biotechnology, Tech, Marine biology, Technology, Sustainability

name: Lince Capital
description: Lince Capital is dedicated to creating value for investment fund subscribers through innovative and professional asset management. They operate across diverse sectors including real estate, healthcare, technology, and more, supporting SMEs and startups with high growth potential. Lince Capital offers services like venture capital funding, subsidiary management, feasibility studies, and financial model validation, backed by a network of trusted contacts and strategic partnerships.
investmentAreas: Sector agnostic, positive impact

name: Bynd Venture Capital
description: Bynd is an Iberian Venture Capital firm established in 2010, focusing on seed and early-stage technology companies with a connection to Iberia. With over 50 investments across various verticals and geographies, Bynd emphasizes sustainable profitability, non-negotiable integrity, and responsible commitment. Their entrepreneurial approach supports entrepreneurs' development and growth goals, creating a positive ecosystem impact.
investmentAreas: IT/Digital and Sustainability

name: Iberis Capital
description: Iberis Capital is a private equity and venture capital manager in Portugal, founded in 2017, focusing on innovation, growth, and yielding investments. With over €570 million in assets under management and more than 1200 investors, Iberis emphasizes interest alignment, a high-performance team, and full independence and compliance.
investmentAreas: industry and technology

name: MSM
description: MSM is an impact Venture Capital fund that invests in the great businesses of the future, those that solve social and environmental challenges. MSM targets fast-growing European ventures with global lock-step potential where impact and financial returns are mutually reinforcing
investmentAreas: Impact, sustainability, social good

name: HCapital Partners
description: HCapital focuses its VC investment activity on small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) with a high technological nature, featuring innovative and scalable global business models, and presenting high growth potential.
investmentAreas: Energy, Telecommunications, mobility, logistics, industrial operations and delivery

name: Caixa Capital
description: Caixa Capital invests across all sectors with a focus on information technology and is a Portuguese private equity and venture capital firm.
investmentAreas: Finance, Financial Services, Venture Capital

name: Bright Ventures
description: Bright Ventures is the investment arm of Bright Pixel, focusing on tech companies with a particular emphasis on B2B in the retail, telco, and cyber-security sectors. They invest in various stages of development, from early (MVP) to growth stages, and possible Post-seed and Series A follow-ons. Their investment management team and committee bring years of proven experience in building, selling companies, and managing global tech-based investment funds.
investmentAreas: Cybersecurity, retail technologies and infrastructure software

name: N1 investment fund
description: FRFM Tech focuses on projects at the nexus of finance and technology, creating new products, growing startups beyond the MVP stage, and managing large companies. They work with startups like Asquad, a multicurrency payment ecosystem, and Transenix, a modern payment acceptance system.
investmentAreas: Fintech, payments, future banking

name: 33N Ventures
description: 33N is a European VC specializing in B2B cybersecurity and infrastructure software exclusively, the latter including segments such as developer tools, cloud infrastructure, data infrastructure and AI/ML tools. With deep domain expertise, they provide direct and indirect market access through a network of CISOs, CTOs, and tech executives. 33N invests in Series A and B rounds, focusing on companies with proven technology and high growth potential.
investmentAreas: Cybersecurity and Infrastructure software

name: LC Ventures
description: LC Ventures, founded in 2015, partners with forward-looking founders at pre-seed and seed stages, focusing on innovative tech companies with software-only solutions. With over €100M under management and 50+ portfolio companies, they provide strategic and operational support, leveraging a network of industry leaders. Their investments span multiple funds, targeting various regions in Portugal, with a hands-on approach to scaling businesses
investmentAreas: Software-only solutions

name: Explorer Investments
description: Founded in 2003, Explorer Investments is an independent Private Equity firm in Portugal, manages and advises funds with net assets around €1.4 billion, divided into Private Equity and Tourism. Pioneers in creative solutions, they excel with proven expertise and responsiveness to new investment opportunities
investmentAreas: Private Equity, Growth Capital, Tourism and Real Estate

name: Sparkfood
description: Sparkfood, an investor funding next-generation companies towards a sustainable and healthier future, leverages expert knowledge, capital, and processes to craft bespoke investment strategies. Committed to long-term success, Sparkfood nurtures growth by continuously supporting their partners.
investmentAreas: Manufacturing, Alternative protein, plant-based, food processing

name: hypra.fund
description: Hypra, launched in March 2022, is an investment fund dedicated to developing complex technological projects. They focus on tech-driven companies, providing support and ready-to-work development teams to build massive future businesses. With expertise in setting up operational processes and creating dream teams, Hypra aims to make every project in their portfolio as powerful as possible.
investmentAreas: Web3, web developments, banking, mobile apps, financial services

name: Ask Capital
description: Advisory Services Kapital is a venture capital firm specializing in the growth potential of Portuguese SMEs with innovative, disruptive, and technologically differentiated projects. Supported by the ISQ Group, Portugal's largest technological infrastructure, ASK has been operating since 2006. They manage three venture capital funds: ASK Marginal focused on tourism and real estate in Lisbon, AI Medical for AI-driven medical technologies, and Energy Yield for photovoltaic and Green Economy projects
investmentAreas: http://www.ask.pt/

name: BlueCrow Capital
description: BlueCrow Capital, founded in 2010, manages €570M in assets across 16 investment funds, focusing on structuring and executing project financing strategies while adhering to ESG best practices. The Company operates in various sectors, including robotics, sustainable food, AI, and new technologies, with a strong presence in venture capital since 2016, supporting projects that promote decarbonization, food supply enhancement, and renewable resource optimization.
investmentAreas: robotics & ICT, IoT, biotech, sustainable food, augmented reality, medtech, agriculture, fintech, retail

name: Start Ventures
description: Start Ventures, managed by Onetier Partners SCR, S.A., is a global VC investor focused on Financial Services, particularly in seed-stage Fintech and Insurtech B2B startups. They provide resources, guidance, and a hands-on approach to help visionary founders scale their businesses and achieve global success. With deep sector expertise and an extensive network, Start Ventures is committed to transforming the financial sector through technology.

name: Critical Ventures
description: Critical Ventures is a venture capital firm led by tech entrepreneurs, investing in disruptive deep tech software companies across IoT, AI, cybersecurity, and more. They provide more than just funding, offering hands-on expertise and fostering organic growth without relying on continuous funding rounds. As part of a broader technology ecosystem, they support their portfolio with a robust network of resources and talent.
investmentAreas: IoT, Automatisation, Digitalisation, Cyber Security, AI/ML, Descentralised Tech, UxD / Interfaces, Mobility, Medical Software.

name: GED Ventures Portugal

Their #Tech4Purpose initiative focuses on supporting transformative and sustainable technologies that leave a positive legacy for future generations

name: Pathena
description: PATHENA is a Venture Capital Firm renowned for propelling the success of Information Technology and Digital Health companies. They focus on boosting disruptive business ideas through a highly reputable management team. Their diverse portfolio includes companies offering innovative solutions in corporate merchandising, intelligent transport, and medical care, emphasizing their commitment to transformative technologies

name: M4 Ventures
description: M4 Ventures is an early stage venture capital firm that assist business organizations with investment management and PE funds.

name: WISENEXT
description: Wisenext is primarily devoted to local sustainable digital businesses having creative, innovative and differentiated projects, with a high potential of scalability, driven by a born global mindset and cutting edge technology.

name: Valutia

name: Beta-i

name: Best Horizon

name: EDP Ventures

investmentAreas: Climatech, Greentech, Energy, Renewables, Distributed Energy Resources, Decarbonization, Grids, Storage & Flexibility, H2

name: Cedrus Capital
description: Cedrus Capital is a private equity investment manager in Lisbon, focusing on Portuguese small and mid-caps with high-performance funds. name: Hangar X

They specialize in beverage development, providing consulting services to entrepreneurs and established brands, while also prioritizing investments in real estate, technology, consumer goods, and more. Based in Lisbon, they operate a private investment family office and collaborate with their U.S. affiliate, Prim Ventures, Inc.

name: ISQ Fund

name: Tejo Ventures

name: 2bpartner Sociedade de Capital de Risco S.A.

name: Semapa Next
description: Semapa Next is a venture capital firm that invests in teams of exceptional founders from Series A to late-stage funding. We want to be a long-term partner of exceptional teams that are positively changing the world we live in.

name: Lince Capital
description: Lince Capital is dedicated to creating value for investment fund subscribers through innovative and professional asset management. They operate across diverse sectors including real estate, healthcare, technology, and more, supporting SMEs and startups with high growth potential. Lince Capital offers services like venture capital funding, subsidiary management, feasibility studies, and financial model validation, backed by a network of trusted contacts and strategic partnerships.

investmentAreas: Data, digitization, connectivity

name: Portugal Ventures
description: Portugal Ventures was created with the ambition of boosting the global success of Portuguese companies, leading them to achieve competitiveness goals in all phases of their business development. They invest in Digital & Technology, Industry & Technology, Health Technologies, and Tourism, supporting startups from pre-seed to Series A stages. Founded in June 2012, Portugal Ventures fosters growth, competitiveness, and internationalization, guided by the values of commitment, transparency, and excellence.
investmentAreas: Digital & Technology, Industry & Technology, Health Technologies, Tourism

name: Faber
description: Faber is a founder-first venture capital firm with a focus on investing in tech teams from Europe that have a global vision. They prioritize talent driven by mission and values, aiming to build diverse and inclusive cultures.
investmentAreas: AI/data, Climate/ Ocean tech and Web3
